subject: French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: One phenomenal tennis streak will end in the French Open men's final as Roger Federer has won three Grand Slam tournaments in a row and 27 straight Grand Slam matches and Rafael Nadal has won 59 consecutive matches on clay.
snippet: One phenomenal tennis streak will end in the French Open men's final as Roger Federer has won three Grand Slam tournaments in a row and 27 straight Grand Slam matches and Rafael Nadal has won 59 consecutive matches on clay.
